channel-type.label: Add
channel-type.description: Add the given Zone Player to the group of this Zone Player

channel-type.label: Set Alarm
channel-type.description: Set the first occurring alarm either ON or OFF. Alarms first have to be defined through the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Alarm Properties
channel-type.description: Properties of the alarm currently running

channel-type.label: Alarm is running
channel-type.description: Set to ON if the alarm was triggered

channel-type.label: Clear Queue
channel-type.description: Suppress all songs from the current queue

channel-type.label: Coordinator
channel-type.description: UDN of the coordinator for the current group

channel-type.label: Current Album
channel-type.description: Name of the album currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Album Cover Art
channel-type.description: Cover art of the album currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Album Cover Art URL
channel-type.description: Cover art URL of the album currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Track
channel-type.description: Name of the current track or radio station currently playing

channel-type.label: Current track URI
channel-type.description: URI of the current track

channel-type.label: Current AV transport URI
channel-type.description: URI of the current AV transport

channel-type.label: Favorite
channel-type.description: Play the given favorite entry. The favorite entry has to be predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Led
channel-type.description: Set or get the status of the white led on the front of the Zone Player

channel-type.label: Local Coordinator
channel-type.description: Indicator set to ON if this Zone Player is the Zone Group Coordinator

channel-type.label: Night Mode
channel-type.description: Enable or disable the night mode feature

channel-type.label: Notification Sound
channel-type.description: Play a notification sound by a given URI

channel-type.label: Play Playlist
channel-type.description: Play the given playlist. The playlist has to predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Play Queue
channel-type.description: Play the songs from the current queue

channel-type.label: Play Track
channel-type.description: Play the given track number from the current queue

channel-type.label: Play URI
channel-type.description: Play the given URI

channel-type.label: Public Address
channel-type.description: Put all Zone Players in one group, and stream audio from the line-in from the Zone Player that triggered the command

channel-type.label: Radio
channel-type.description: Play the given radio station. The radio station has to be predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Remove
channel-type.description: Remove the given Zone Player from the group of this Zone Player

channel-type.label: Repeat
channel-type.description: Repeat track or queue playback

channel-type.label: Restore
channel-type.description: Restore the state of the Zone Player

channel-type.label: Restore All
channel-type.description: Restore the state of all the Zone Players

channel-type.label: Save
channel-type.description: Save the state of the Zone Player

channel-type.label: Save All
channel-type.description: Save the state of all the Zone Players

channel-type.label: Shuffle
channel-type.description: Shuffle queue playback

channel-type.label: Sleep Timer
channel-type.description: Set/show the duration of the sleep timer in seconds

channel-type.label: Snooze
channel-type.description: Snooze the running alarm, if any, with the given number of minutes

channel-type.label: Speech Enhancement
channel-type.description: Enable or disable the speech enhancement feature

channel-type.label: Stand Alone
channel-type.description: Make the Zone Player leave its group and become a standalone Zone Player

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: The State channel contains state of the Zone Player, e.g. PLAYING, STOPPED,...

channel-type.label: Stop
channel-type.description: Stop the Zone Player. ON if the player is stopped.

channel-type.label: TuneIn Station Id
channel-type.description: Provide the current TuneIn station id or play the TuneIn radio given by its station id

channel-type.label: Zone Group ID
channel-type.description: Id of the Zone Group the Zone Player belongs to

channel-type.label: Zone Name
channel-type.description: Name of the Zone Group associated to the Zone Player

channel-type.label: Line-in connected
channel-type.description: Indicator set to ON when the line-in of the Zone Player is connected

channel-type.label: Play Line-in
channel-type.description: Play the line-in of the the Zone Player corresponding to the given UIN
